body.name: [Auto Focus & Keystone] Android TV 4K Projector with Prime Video Bulit-in,1300Ansi lumens Home Movie Outdoor Projector 4K+ with Wifi 6 and Bluetooth,50% Zoom & 500"Dispaly,8000+ Apps,Dust-Proof
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 47 mins
features: 🎁【4K Projector & HDR10 Stunning Brightness 1300 ANSI 】 DIPIKPRJ Adopt 6” 1080P Screen to display which have Higher clarity, delicacy, brightness. Unlike other 2.6”/3.5”/4.5"/5" 1080P mini projector, Enjoy the vibrant and clear images even in a well-lit room and the edges are clear.4K Projector adopted independent R&D intelligent noise reduction tech,greatly improve the brightness up to 1300ANSI,at least 85% higher resolution and clarity than other led projector,Integrated OpenGL 3.2, DCI-P3 Wid

🎁【2023 Newest Auto Focus & Auto 6D Keystone Correction & 500"big Screen】①➤Instead of fussy and repetitive manual adjustments, Smart projector built-in displacement gyroscope and sensor,It can automatically detect changes and movement in the environment,adjusting the picture accordingly to ensure it stays clear without you having to focus the lens yourself..②➤A freely adjustable,extra-large screen size （500"screen，）that offers visual effects.

🎁【Android TV & Support DNS】①➤Android TV Projector with 8000+ apps gives you access to over 500,000+ movies and TV episodes. Watch favorites from Prime Video, YouTube, Disney+, HBO Max, and others.Also the TV dongle is detachable for most micro HDMI output devices, laptops, PCs, tablets, etc., plug and play.

🎁【 WiFi6 & 2.4G+5G Dual-band & 5.2 Bidirectional Bluetooth】①➤Dual-Band WiFi projector provides faster and more stable wireless screen mirroring connection.Whether watching high-resolution movies, listening to high-quality musics, or playing games, speed and stability are what you can expect. ②➤With bluetooth 5.2, this bluetooth projector can easily connects to your ideal headphones, speakers, or other audio equipment.

🎁【No More Black dot & Presentation via USB &Lifetime Warranty】①➤Designed with a fully sealed optical core,this LED video projector is not easy to enter dust, which effectively reduces screen black spots and image quality loss.②➤The projector supports reading ppt/xlsx/docx files via USB.③➤We provide life-long professional technical support and customer service. Any questions, please feel free to contact us.

Can this movie projector connect to my sound bar via HD cable? Of course, this projector has two HD ports, and the HD1 port supports ARC. You can connect it to your desired sound bar via HD cable. Can I connect a mouse to the smart projector for more convenient navigation on some apps? Sure, this LED video projector has 2 USB ports, choose any one. How to put on the lens cap after using the movie projector? Please long press the F+ key on the remote before turning off the video projector. The lens will retract, and then put on the lens cap. How to make this WiFi projector compatible with old routers for stable connection? Please ask us for the latest firmware upgrade. How can I get further assistance for this 1080P outdoor 4K projector? Please send us amazon messages or through the informations on the manual to get further assistance for this projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 stars for price to performance ratio
reviews.reviewText: The projector isn't quite perfect, but it is very good, and factoring in the the price I'd call it excellent. If there was an option to give fractional stars in reviews, I'd give it a 4.5 or so, but the price point made me round up rather than down.I reviewed a previous version a couple of years ago, and this is a significant step up.Image-wise, the colors are good, shadow detail is good, highlight detail is good. I watched a couple of episodes of tv shows, I'd previously watched on both the old projector and a decent quality TV and saw details I'd missed in shadows before.My only complaint so far is that the image is slightly less than perfectly sharp, but the only time I've found it noticeable at a normal viewing distance (across the room) is on text when using the projector as a computer monitor. I did find it usable as a monitor after adjusting my mac to a lower resolution, so I don't consider it to be a huge problem.I found set up to be easy. The autofocus works quickly. The menus are simple and reasonably intuitive.It comes in a travel bag, that seems reasonably protective.Overall I's say it's a great deal for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Keystone projector is a must have. My projector is on the left side of my living room not in the middle. Automatic Focus is a plus and it's on the remote control too. Bluetooth is on point matches the lips. And it's connected to my sound bar. My fire stick works perfectly. My projector screen is 120 inches and it's bright also you can adjust the personal color, sharpness, brightness and much more is a plus. The fan noise is okay that's with any projector you will hear the fan but you'll get used to it, also has a removable dust filter make sure you turn off the projector before you pull it out once a week also the inside it is sealed to reduce the spots on the lens hopefully by cleaning my filter and covering it I won't get no spots in the future. I also bought a cover for it for $10 on Amazon I'm very happy with this projector there's more extras also loaded with some apps but if you have the fire stick you don't need them .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Burned lens in only months use but got a replacement
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Update: I was able to contact the seller and they agreed to send me a replacement. Different model, but it works the exact same—very quiet, good picture, poor functioning native apps—but works well with a streaming device. I appreciate the customer service.Netflix and others apps were a pain to navigate, so I’ve primarily been using my projector to view from a streaming device. Everything was going well until I noticed this random dark spot that I can't get rid of. Not sure how this got burned into the lens, because I don’t typically keep it on idly. Of course, I’m JUST out of my product support window, so I’m stuck with it. It’s not terrible, but noticeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price, but you get what you paid for…
reviews.reviewText: Overall this projector is extremely ok. Easy to use and good brightness, it’s really not bad for watching TV or movies. BUT! If you plan to use this to watch sports or play video games, be aware of the choppy/laggy picture. There’s no way to adjust frame rate and it’s quite distracting for fast-moving videos.Update: the seller reached out and was very accommodating to help resolve my issues, even after the standard return period. I have to say, great customer service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, much better than I expected!
reviews.reviewText: This is the first projector I bought for personal use. I use a lot of different models at work, and I’ll tell you, this one is worth every penny for what it does!We used it for day projection and it did not disappoint. For movie nights, it’s great. Really nice device.My favorite features: auto focus!!! Super large projection area. Good quality when projected from far (22 feet). Phone mirroring. No hassle hdmi connection.My wish list: apparently it does not support Miracast, so I can’t project remotely from my Windows 11 laptop.Overall: I would recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Auto focus feature is amazing
reviews.reviewText: I love the auto focus and Horizontal keystone correction. You definitely need Horizontal keystone feature if you are placing the projector on side table. Most of the projectors come with Vertical keystone and lack Horizontal keystone feature. Please choose this projector if your can't place the projector straight in front of the screen. It runs Android TV and has lot of options. Very good brightness and picture clarity. Can watch movies clearly even when low lights are turned on. Customer service through Amazon and email for product service and accessories. Good Wifi and Bluetooth connectivity. Amazon fire stick works fine and you can install most of the streaming apps.
